      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>promethean</catalog>
            <entry>8286</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en-US">Two Digit Addition With Regrouping</string>
          </title>
          <language>en-US</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en-US">This flipchart will help the second grade student review three digit place value and comparing numbers. It has a helpful work mat for teaching two digit addition with regrouping. Students will learn how to identify important words used to determine the type of operation needed to solve a word problem.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">place value</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">hundreds chart</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">regrouping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en-US">Addition - Subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
